title: La Cigale du Golfe
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Mediterranean, Take-out, Middle Eastern, Lebanese, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Owned by brothers who make all food in-house. Offers a selection for vegetarians and some vegan items. Choose from the mezze selection or kitchen will make a wrap or main dish not on the menu using what they have. There is an open kitchen area for ordering take away, an indoor restaurant next door, and outside seating on the waterfront by the port.
